comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: an impressive view of an impressive ship.  This may be late 1915 or ealy 16 16 during her fitting out when he ammunition hoists were being installed at the New York or Boston Navy Yard.  Note the front turret roof is not currently installed.
